text_block_list.text: One day, while I was training with Sakura Bakushin O for the race, I received some great news.
Sakura Bakushin O has been selected as the "Hottest Uma Musume of the Year." I'm looking for her to report it to her…

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: You're really something, Bakushin O-chan!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: It's amazing to be published in such a prestigious magazine. Looks like speed really is the most important thing, huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fufuun, I know, I know!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As expected of such a brilliant class president, I seem to have impressed you all!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: I didn't say that much…
There seems to be some kind of buzz around her classmates. I'll talk to her later…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer! Greetings!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You've come to the right place! I'm getting a ton of compliments right now!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, I am brilliant, so it's only natural! Trainer, come join us!
choice_data_list: What was she complimenting you on?
What was she complimenting you on?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, what were you complimenting me on!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O-chan was chosen as the "Featured Uma Musume of the Year" by a magazine…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's this!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Spectacular! Everyone in the media, you have an excellent eye!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: I just told you…

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: You knew she was like this. Trainer, I'll ask you to take care of the rest.
Her classmates simply left. I can see why she's usually standing on her own…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It seems the times have finally caught up with my Bakushin-ing!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let me take a look at that magazine straightaway――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Where is everyone!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see! Then, I must go and look for the magazine!
I told Sakura Bakushin O that I was looking for her just to talk about it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is that so!! Now, to the Trainer's office!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin!
――and, thus far, Sakura Bakushin O had been in a good mood, however…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmmmmm…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's all this! This is… In the name of class president, I must object!
choice_data_list: There's some pretty good stuff in there.

text_block_list.text: Big journalists voted on the most popular Uma Musume. If you look at the comments on her, they're all rave reviews, but…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No! You're overlooking something very important!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To begin with! Why did they put me in the "short distance" category?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Saying I'm the "Sprint Favourite" and so on… Those media folk are short-sighted! No, blind!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is this really okay? I'm an Uma Musume who can't be confined in such a small category as "short-distance"!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If you want to know why! It's because I'm the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And yet, to be shoved into a box like this… is frustrating!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This year, we'll definitely, absolutely win the Classic and show them what we're made of!
…Apparently, the praise from the reporters only served to ignite Sakura Bakushin O's competitive spirit.
As much as I'd love to let her win the Classic, at this point I can't see her getting results outside of sprints.
…I've got to convince Sakura Bakushin O to do whatever it takes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What is it!!
choice_data_list:
Why don't we take a look at the results of the 
Spring Stakes?

Why don't we take a look at the results of the 
Spring Stakes?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huuh…? Mm, what is the meaning of this?
I believe that Sakura Bakushin O is an amazingly talented Uma Musume who can win every single race.
However, it's true, she's still developing. Depending on the Spring Stakes results, I may need to rethink her training.
Depending on the results, I'd like to develop her exceptional speed on shorter distances, mainly. That's what I told her…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Does that mean that there is a possibility that… I won't run the Classic this year!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's going to be a big pileup on Bakushin Road, isn't it!?
choice_data_list: We have to go through thick and thin to reach our goal!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: All for the future of the Arima Kinen…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh… Ohhhhh…! I'm not sure I understand, but――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――that's kind of cool!!
…I think I'm starting to understand how to handle her, or rather, how to guide her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Okay, I understand… Let's swear on it! You are a trustworthy person.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In the unlikely event that I lose, I'll focus on short distance training.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If it leads to the future!
I'm not lying when I say it's the future. Anyway, now I had the means to convince her to train for the short distance.
